scripts.build-js: NODE_PATH=. browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] src/client/main.js > public/app.js
scripts.copy-files: cp src/client/index.html public/index.html && cp src/client/main.css public/app.css
scripts.copy-fonts: cp -R src/client/fonts public/ && cp src/client/style.styl public/style.styl
scripts.build: npm run public && npm run copy-files && npm run build-js
scripts.build-w-vrview: npm run public && npm run copy-files && npm run build-js && npm run copy-vrview
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run serve
